name: MedicatioN HTML
description:
You play with WASD and shoot with left mouse, switch weapons with "1, 2, 3, 4".

HTML5 DEMO, FULL VERSION HERE: https://matecodev.itch.io/medication

Want to play something hard? You love cats?

You love a CHALLENGE?

If one of this questions was YES then, try to play this game with only ONE life without DIE.
